backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining types and CRUD logic for fields, tasks, user profiles, and authorization using AccessControl with per‑caller role enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking modal opacity styling fix to affected frontend file and component versions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing responsibilities and recent behavior changes of all major frontend files.
frontend/docs/deploy-and-localdev-regres: Full regression checklist for verifying builds, deployments, login flow, and core CRUD features in local and production environments.
frontend/docs/field-create-failure-repro: Guide documenting reproducible steps and expected behavior for diagnosing field creation failures.
frontend/docs/production-redeploy-runboo: Runbook outlining the steps, prerequisites, and safety checks for performing a clean production redeploy.
frontend/docs/production-smoke-check-pro: Procedure for a 15–20 minute post‑deploy smoke test covering critical path and core functionality.
frontend/docs/production-smoke-check-res: Template file for recording results of the production smoke check, including critical path and CRUD tests.
frontend/docs/profile-save-failure-repro: Explains a profile save failure caused by missing auth and actor-readiness guards, with reproduction steps and fixes applied to mutation logic, UI, and error handling.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color and layout tokens.
frontend/index.html: Provides the base HTML document with a root container and loads the pre-React bootstrap and main app modules.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling authentication, actor/profile boot logic, error recovery, and conditional rendering of dashboard or login/profile setup flows.
frontend/src/bootstrap/bootFallback.ts: Implements a pre-React boot error UI that sanitizes and displays startup errors if React fails to mount in time.
frontend/src/bootstrap/preReactGlobals.t: Initializes browser-safe global shims and environment variables, then loads boot fallback handlers before React starts.
frontend/src/components/AllTasksView.tsx: Renders a searchable and sortable list of tasks using query hooks, with filtering, sorting controls, and task display UI.
frontend/src/components/CreateFieldDialo: Dialog component that handles authenticated creation of a new Field with a name and background color. Manages login flow, actor readiness, and form submission using createField mutation.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Dialog for creating a new Task within a field, including 1–5 scale attributes, duration settings, and optional dependencies. Submits via createTask mutation and resets form on success.
Dialog for editing an existing Field’s name, icon, color, and background. Syncs UI with field data on open and updates the field via updateField mutation.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing a Task’s properties, duration unit, dependencies, and optionally moving it to another field. Loads initial values on open and updates or moves tasks through corresponding mutations.
frontend/src/components/FieldCard.tsx: Card UI displaying field metadata, icon, average task metrics, and total active task duration. Fetches tasks for the field and applies themed styling based on field color.
frontend/src/components/FieldDetailError: Error boundary that wraps field detail views, showing a recovery UI with error info and back/reset controls when an exception occurs.
Displays a field’s details and tasks with filtering, sorting, and dialogs for creating, editing, and deleting fields and tasks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the app header with theme toggle, user profile dropdown, and logout handling via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ImportDataConfir: Confirmation dialog that warns users before overwriting all fields and tasks during data import.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Displays a login screen with feature highlights and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting authenticated users to enter and save their profile name with status and loading states.
frontend/src/components/RecoverableBootE: Shows an error screen for recoverable boot issues with retry, logout, and expandable diagnostic details.
frontend/src/components/SortDirectionTog: Button component for toggling ascending/descending sort order with tooltip guidance.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Task card UI component that displays task details, handles completion, undo, deletion, and editing with dialogs and toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, fields, tasks, and related backend data with error normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Builds a resilient backend actor with retry logic, logging, and cache invalidation when identity or actor changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and field background colors plus base UI styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page handling field/task views, search/sort, authentication state, and import/export actions.
frontend/src/utils/bootErrorMessages.ts: Provides utilities to extract readable IC error messages and detect specific error conditions like missing profiles or stopped canisters.
frontend/src/utils/downloadJson.ts: Utility for exporting data by serializing objects to JSON, handling BigInt, and triggering a file download.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Helpers for converting durations between units and formatting total minutes into human‑readable strings.
Normalizes export‑data errors into user‑friendly categories and messages.
frontend/src/utils/fieldAppearance.ts: Defines icon/color presets for fields and utilities to safely resolve icons and colors.
Defines available background themes for field cards and utilities to resolve CSS variables by ID.
frontend/src/utils/fieldCreationErrors.t: Normalizes field‑creation errors into friendly messages, handling auth, actor readiness, and backend traps.
frontend/src/utils/lucideIconMap.ts: Defines a production-safe registry mapping icon names to Lucide React icons and provides a fallback icon.
frontend/src/utils/parseExportPayload.ts: Validates and converts exported JSON into typed Field and Task objects, restoring Principals and BigInt values.
frontend/src/utils/profileSaveErrors.ts: Normalizes various profile save errors into user-friendly messages with categorized error types.
frontend/src/utils/softColorTint.ts: Generates soft, theme-aware color tints by mixing hex colors for card and icon backgrounds.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, issues, and feature requests related to modal styling and restoring Heroicons rendering.
